1.content:
The turtles had another normal day, spending their time inside the lair. Just then , a loud boom was heard coming from Donnie's lab. Donnie caused himself to get jumped out from his lab. Luckily landing in the water.

" You okay, dude?" Mikey asked

" Yeah, well, a little." Donnie said touching his shoulder

" What happened?" Raph asked.

" I don't know. I was working on a potion. When it suddenly exploded."

" Alright then, Mikey, go look if it's okay in there." Leo demanded

" What? No way, dude! We should all go!"

" Well, he makes a point." Raph added.

So the turtles entered Donnie's lab, when they saw the jar back to normal.

" Huh. I don't see anything." Leo told.

Soon, the jar started glowing into green colour.

" What's happening?!" Mikey screamed.

" Make it stop, Leo!" Raph barked

Just then, the jar stopped glowing.

" Phew! That was a close one!" Mikey gulped.

Then the jar broke down, and the liquid was covered to each of the turtles. They started growing up to 20ft. Soon, the four reached the under street "ceiling". They attempted to break free, when the people from down there, started running in terror.

" Oh my god, we are enormous!" Donnie said surprisly.

" What do we do now?" Leo wondered.

" How about we kick some bad guys butt, since we're in this enormous size!" Raph said punching his hand with a fist.

" Hmmm, that's not bad. In fact, we can win them!" Donnie smiled evily.

Who they are gonna fight first?
1.title: Growth Spurt

info.brief_description: the turtles hit a giant growth spurt!!
info.description:
the turtles get huge, in whatever way they can!! gay or straight sex allowed. I'd love for them to be shellless but it's up to you.

only rule I have is no piss or poop.
